name: Lightning Gun
text: Uses (3 ammo). [action]Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +5 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +2 damage.

name: Chicago Typewriter
text: Uses (4 ammo). [action]Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may spend any number of additional actions when you perform this attack. You get +2 [combat] for this attack for each action being spent (including this ability's [action] cost). This attack deals +2 damage.

name: The Gold Pocket Watch
text:
Exceptional.
[lightning] When a phase begins, remove The Gold Pocket Watch from the game: Skip this phase.
[lightning] After a phase ends, remove The Gold Pocket Watch from the game: Repeat that phase.

flavor:
"Do not be frightened by what you see.
Be frightened by what you cannot see."
name: Aquinnah
text: [reaction]When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to any enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)
